entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 11 except temperature steady near 6 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches along parts of the coast. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11 except temperature steady near 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
